name: ChoiceBot
0:
”Alexa ask choice bot choose Pizza versus Taco”
”Alexa ask choice bot either heads or tails”
”Alexa ask choice bot choose yes or no”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choice bot
des:
Ever stuck in situations where you have to choose one between two? Fear not - Choice Bot has come to the rescue!
 It makes hard decisions in seconds and makes your life much simpler!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
